bees.Name: jar of angry bees
bees.Description: A jar of angry bees is exactly what it sounds like: a jar of angry bees.

hornets.Name: jar of indifferent murder hornets
hornets.Tagline: a jar of indifferent murder hornets
hornets.Description: A jar of indifferent murder hornets is a jar full of indifferent murder hornets. What, were you expecting something clever?

wasps.Name: jar of slightly annoyed wasps
wasps.Tagline: a jar of slightly annoyed wasps
wasps.Description: A jar of slightly annoyed wasps is a jar filled with slightly annoyed wasps. I don't get paid enough to write these, okay?
